urlset:
{{ site.url }}/ 2024-09-15 weekly 1.0
{{ site.url }}/blog 2024-09-15 weekly 0.9
{{ site.url }}/newsletter 2024-09-15 monthly 0.8
{{ site.url }}/academy 2024-09-15 monthly 0.8
{{ site.url }}/shop 2024-09-15 weekly 0.8
{{ site.url }}/projects 2024-09-15 monthly 0.7
{{ site.url }}/apex 2024-09-15 monthly 0.7
{{ site.url }}/contact.html 2024-09-15 yearly 0.6
{{ site.url }}/about.html 2024-09-15 yearly 0.6
{{ site.url }}/privacy-policy.html 2024-09-15 yearly 0.3
{{ site.url }}/terms-of-service.html 2024-09-15 yearly 0.3
{% for post in site.posts %}
{{ site.url }}{{ post.url }} {{ post.date | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }} monthly 0.8
{% endfor %} {% for newsletter in site.newsletters %}
{{ site.url }}{{ newsletter.url }} {{ newsletter.date | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }} never 0.7
{% endfor %}
